des: "Like a cool breeze on a hot summer day at the beach, this flavorful fruit salsa is zesty and refreshing! Serve it with tortilla chips. "
ins: In a food processor, place tomato, orange, kiwis, red onion, avocado, cilantro and jalapeno chile peppers. Process using pulse setting until finely chopped but not quite smooth. Transfer to a medium bowl, and garnish with desired amount of garlic salt.
